TITLE: Yoram Hazony | The Ben Shapiro Show Sunday Special Ep. 129
SUMMARY: Returning to the show, philosopher and scholar Yoram Hazony helps me dissect many of the developments in conservative thought. Yoram’s work has been vigorously discussed across both liberal and conservative media, most recently in response to his new book, “Conservatism: A Rediscovery”, where he writes of the “New Right” and America’s only way forward.

TITLE: Ep. 1546 - Joe Biden Is Made Of Covid
SUMMARY: After emerging from covid-induced isolation, Joe Biden tests positive again and goes back into isolation; Democrats cheer their inaptly-named Inflation Reduction Act; and Jon Stewart yells at the Republicans some more.

TITLE: Ep. 1547 - Will Nancy Pelosi Spark World War III?
SUMMARY: Nancy Pelosi prepares to visit Taiwan as the Chinese threaten; the military kills Ayman Al Zawahiri with a drone strike; and Beyonce is forced to change her lyrics thanks to political correctness.

TITLE: Ep. 1548 - Are The Republicans Going To Blow 2022?
SUMMARY: Republicans could lose the Senate despite gaining serious electoral ground across the country; rifts reportedly break out between Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and Joe Biden; and Democrats declare monkeypox a public health emergency.

TITLE: Ep. 1549 - The Democrats’ Abortion Celebration
SUMMARY: The media celebrate as Kansas votes to keep its state constitutional protections for abortion; top House Democrats refuse to endorse Joe Biden for re-election; and Texas Governor Greg Abbott invites the mayors of DC and New York to the southern border.

TITLE: Ep. 1550 - The Backlash Against Woke Prosecutors Is Only Beginning
SUMMARY: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis fires a prosecutor for refusing to enforce a state ban on sexual mutilation of children; the White House declares monkeypox a national health emergency, but debate remains over telling people not to have sex with randos; and China ratchets up tensions over Taiwan.
